message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: GI
Hay una lista de conferencias en
http://www.glismo.org/conferences2008.htm
.
Third International Workshop on "Geographical Analysis, Urban Modeling, Spatial Statistics" (
GEOG-AN-MOD 08
,
http://www.lisut.org/workshop/geog_an_mod_08/
) at International Conference on Computational Science and its Applications (
ICCSA 2008
). June 30th to July 3rd, 2008. University of Perugia, Perugia, Italy.
Submission deadline
: 14 February 2008 (
10 to 16 pages LNCS
).
Workshop “Semantic Web meets Geospatial Applications” at 11th International Conference on Geographic Information Science (
AGILE 2008
,
http://musil.uni-muenster.de/events/agile/
). Girona, Spain, May 5th, 2008. Deadline for submission: 22 Feb 2008 (
short papers (max 3000 words), position papers (max 1500 words), or demonstrations (max 1500 words)
)
2nd International Workshop on Semantic and Conceptual Issues in GIS (
SeCoGIS 2008
,
http://cs.ulb.ac.be/conferences/secogis08/
) at 27th International Conference on Conceptual Modeling (
ER 2008
). Barcelona, Spain, October 20th - 23rd, 2008. Deadline for paper abstract: March 15. Deadline for full paper: 29 March 2008 (
10 pages in LNCS format
)
The Fourth International Workshop "Information Fusion and Geographic Information Systems" (
IF&GIS'09
,
http://oogis.ru/content/view/59/49/lang,en/
). St. Petersburg, Russia, May 17-20, 2009.
Abstract submission deadline – October, 03, 2008. Paper submission deadline – November, 21, 2008 (
12 pages in LNCS format
)
speaker: SYSTEM
